name: Hank
description:
When an evil teddy bear wields dark magic to corrupt all the other toys in the house, it's up to HANK to defend his home before his family returns.

Game Features:

1. Toy-sized Chaos: Experience the world from the perspective of a pint-sized robot in this unique first-person shooter. Engage in fun battles against possessed toy robots, Jack in the boxes and more as you navigate through your house.

2. Arsenal of Destruction: Hank may be small, but he packs a punch! Upgrade Hank's weaponry, from high-tech lasers to explosive rocket launchers. Unleash devastating firepower on your enemies, turning them into scrap metal in style.

3. Fun Boss Fights: From a evil vacuum cleaner, to a teddy bear in a tank fight your way through each level to eventually fight the boss!
Press F - To change fire mode

Made by a two man team using Unreal 5.
